attributes.action: not allow Leeds United AFC to have their 15 point deduction removed by the Football League
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds United fans want to get their 15 point deduction removed. It was given to them for a reason and is a relatively light punishment considering what happened to Boston United. Sign this petition and show your disgust at Leeds United's blatant attempts to play the system to the detriment of everyone else. The Football League must not remove this justified deduction if they want to maintain any credibility.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
